titlecompany: Team Lead Senior Analyst at Google Maps
body: Experienced professional with MBA in Business Management and Finance & M.S in Information Technology. Over 7 years of experience in implementing and supporting IT operations and multiple business projects for Google Maps, Wipro for client Hewlett Packard. Skilled in project management, operations management, staffing and resource planning, managing metrics, people management, project life cycle, and KPI delivery. Proficient in Core Java, SQL, Microsoft Office, PowerPoint, Excel, Visio & Project. Seeking PMP certification.
education: MBA in Business Management and Finance & M.S in Information Technology, Diploma in Computer Applications, Completed Web Designing & MS office package course from APTECH Computers- India
requiredskills: Project management, operations management, staffing and resource planning, managing metrics, people management, project life cycle, Core Java, SQL, Microsoft Office, PowerPoint, Excel, Visio & Project
